Actions.Text: REFERRED TO NEW YORK CITY EDUCATION
REFERRED TO NEW YORK CITY EDUCATION

Title: Establishes representative requirements for district leadership teams and school leadership teams
Summary: Requires district leadership teams and school leadership teams to include student representatives; provides who should appoint such representatives.
LawCode: Add Title 21-A Chap 23-A ยง21-990.1, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to establishing certain requirements for district leadership teams and school leadership teams
